title: Bachelor of Music in Music Education
description: The Music Education division of the School of Music at Kennesaw State University in Georgia is committed to creating leading music educators. As a Music Education student, you’ll work with professors who have either university or public school experience in over ten states. Our faculty features specialists and mentors in Choral, General, Instrumental, and Orchestra education.
careers: Band Director, Music Historian, Private Instrument Tutor
